1032 Antifa radicals admit to Arson attack on AfD lawmaker’s car with ‘Incendiary Device’ posted 5 days ago by Milward 38 comments award share download report block
38 comments Sort by Top Top New Worst Old Save Deplorable556 27 points 5 days ago well slap an immigrant in a suit and call him the mayor, i never would have imagined this... permalink award report block reply Iremembermypassword 17 points 5 days ago I am sure the German Police is hard on their tracks. permalink award report block reply Kekistani 6 points 5 days ago More like hard on their cracks. permalink parent award report block reply Im_RickSteves_bitch 5 points 5 days ago kek I needed that. permalink parent award report block reply Liberats 8 points 5 days ago So it's terrorism they have admitted to. Send in the GSG9 permalink award report block reply CapitalGGeek 6 points 5 days ago https://brusselssignal.eu/2025/11/members-of-germanys-antifa-confess-to-torching-afd-politicians-car/ permalink award report block reply Yheymos 6 points 5 days ago Time for an award from the German government! permalink award report block reply BrewSwillis 3 points 5 days ago Who cares? It's not like the globalist government there is going to do anything to stop it. They are on the same side. Ever since Hitler was ousted, they really have been going 180° in the other direction. Interesting. permalink award report block reply AlexPKeaton 3 points 5 days ago "it's just an idea" permalink award report block reply Bullet3250 3 points 5 days ago USAID leftovers.... permalink award report block reply steini1904 4 points 5 days ago Nope, these people are indirectly payed by the German Gov through various NGOs and benefits. Antifa's hometurf was always Germany, the amount of its sub-organisation in its network here is mind boggling. There are even members in the parliaments, e.g. the German Minister of Finance, and all over the media (although another leftist faction, the Greens, are slightly more dominant there). That's why I don't think AntiFA will be declared an international terrorist organization in the US (and if it happens, it'll be a completely useless definition of who is part of AntiFA, that hardly applies to anyone). But it'd be hilarious and absolutely necessary. Like locking a Minister of Finance out of access to financial institutions, or dropping sanctions on about half a million Germans all at once, either for spreading leftist violence around the globe directly or the NGO- or donor-laundered tax payer money that funds it. permalink parent award report block reply Bullet3250 3 points 5 days ago First USAID sends money to THOSE SAME NGO's - for the same reasons, attack Nationalism and Patriotism in Europe. Second...  and it is complex... but Trump already made the call. On September 22, 2025, Trump signed an Executive Order designating Antifa as a domestic terrorist organization, directing federal agencies to investigate, disrupt, and dismantle its operations and funding sources. Domestic Terrorism is limited in the US.  so - - In October 2025 , Trump expressed intent to escalate this effort by considering Antifa for designation as a foreign terrorist organization (FTO) , stating during a White House roundtable, “Let’s get it done”. FTO designation would carry significant legal consequences , including criminalizing material support to Antifa with penalties of at least 20 years in prison, enabling asset freezes through the Office of Foreign Assets Control, and allowing surveillance and deportation of non-citizens linked to the group. I can barely wait. permalink parent award report block reply Chickensaurus 2 points 5 days ago Well, time for Congress to declare open season on them. Full immunity to hint them down and kill them. permalink award report block reply AbsurdOpinion 2 points 5 days ago "doxing" is a strange way to refer to the Left ORDERING and FUNDING the attacks. permalink award report block reply Weeha 2 points 5 days ago Do not pass go Do not collect Soro's $200 Straight to JAIL permalink award report block reply giggitybooped 2 points 5 days ago Why does the right keep escalating violence?? permalink award report block reply PhantomShield72 1 points 5 days ago "Mostly Peaceful" political statement. permalink award report block reply Idontevenknow 1 points 5 days ago Terrorists used terror? shock. awe. bewilderment permalink award report block reply that_guy_pming_tits 1 points 5 days ago Mostly peaceful, asian, incendiary device? permalink award report block reply RickSanchezC137 1 points 5 days ago Wait, Antifa is only and idea not an organization.
